players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! Diana's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious yet?"
Bob: "This is a tough start. We should all share any observations or suspicions we have."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "I believe Charlie. Alice is the mafioso and we should vote her out immediately."
You: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you were really the detective, wouldn't you be more careful about revealing yourself? This feels like a desperate mafia play to me."
Charlie: "Alice, your attempt to discredit me is exactly what the mafia would do. I'm the detective and I have proof you're guilty. Bob, stand with me."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
